name: The Classic
description:
Take a trip through time, and experience one of the classics. Pong

The Classic is a simulation, where you travel through time, to experience pong with a PC in the 1980s, filled with old computer white noise, and the graphic style of those janky old boxes. Immerse yourself and others in a simple game of pong with ambience and graphics.

*This game is meant to be played by 2 people*

Controls: 

Left Paddle: W, S 

Right Paddle: Up arrow, Down arrow | I, K (for all you 60% keyboard lovers)
